backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, a public directory, and legacy post and event CRUD with storage mixins.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file's purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, age gate, and global toaster for the app.
frontend/src/components/AgeGate.tsx: Age‑verification wrapper that blocks access until the user confirms they are 18+.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login, profile display, admin claiming, and sign‑out menu.
frontend/src/components/community/PostAc: Provides edit and delete controls for posts, including dialogs for editing fields and confirming deletion.
frontend/src/components/community/PostCo: Displays expandable comments section with comment count, input form, and comment listing fetched from queries.
frontend/src/components/community/PostIm: Renders an optional image attachment by converting bytes to a Blob URL and cleaning it up on change.
frontend/src/components/community/PostLi: Shows a like button with count and toggles likes via authenticated mutations.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Global layout with header, nav, auth controls, routed content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoadingState.tsx: Reusable loading indicator with a spinning icon and message.
frontend/src/components/Nav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar rendering desktop links and a mobile sheet menu with active‑route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/profiles/Profile: Displays a grid of profile images using direct URLs from ExternalBlob objects.
Renders a list of external profile links, ensuring URLs are safe and opening them in new tabs.
frontend/src/content/articles.ts: Defines Article type and exports an array of article metadata and full content strings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, creating and managing identities with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, editing, and managing user profiles and follow data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for posts, events, likes, and admin checks, including create, edit, delete, and list operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaticAssetAvailab: Offers a query hook that checks if a static asset URL is reachable using a HEAD/GET fallback strategy.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables defining a soft pastel color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page highlighting mission, community values, offerings, and guidelines using card UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays a full article by slug with metadata, content rendering, and navigation back to the article list.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Renders a grid of article cards with category, read time, and links to article detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityBoardPage.ts: Implements a community board with post listing, creation, editing, deletion, image uploads, and authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form that opens an email client and includes a copy‑to‑clipboard email field.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Displays community events and includes a form for authenticated users to create new events with date and time validation.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a static grid gallery of plushie images with titles and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero section, navigation links, static asset checks, and featured community info.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile view page that loads a user's profile data, follow/like summaries, and enables toggling follow/like actions with authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilesDirectoryPage: Directory page listing public user profiles with avatars and bios, including loading and error states.
frontend/src/utils/actorError.ts: Utility that converts backend error messages into friendly, contextual strings.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachment.ts: Helpers for validating, converting, and formatting image files for uploads with size/type checks.
frontend/src/utils/profileImages.ts: Utilities for converting files to ExternalBlob, previewing images, and retrieving blob URLs.
frontend/src/utils/staticAssetCheck.ts: Checks whether a static asset is reachable using HEAD and GET fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, shadows, and animations for the frontend theme.
project_state.json: Defines project state, theme updates, UI/branding rules, moderation logic, profile behavior, and upcoming features. Lists known issues such as broken PDF downloads and missing images.
